name: test_e2e_with_logs[714_CMDI_PS_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_PS_002` |
| **Name** | PowerShell encoded command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | powershell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;powershell -enc JABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdA`
- **Encoded**: `%3Bpowershell%20-enc%20JABjAGwAaQBlAG4AdA`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes
